attributes.action: Let key workers use the free Covid-19 tests when returning from abroad.
attributes.additional_details: NHS workers, Blue Light Workers, Care Workers and other Key Workers who were working so hard during this period, deserve the appreciation of the nation and I am sure we will have lots of signatures to help us. Thank you very much.
attributes.background: We all understand the necessity of testing when returning from abroad. Still, paying such a high price isn't really showing the appreciation of the nations hard workers who are on low income anyway. Most of us are testing twice weekly anyway and have test kits available at home.
